item.title: Jail/unjail
item.dc:creator: @godz-of-pk godz-of-pk
item.description:
@godz-of-pk wrote:

[quote=“Javaftl, post:6, topic:221356”]use this…

if (command.startsWith("jail") && command.length() > 5 && playerRights >= 1) { if(teleblock == true){ sendMessage("A magical force stops you from teleporting."); //made by Musicmad441 } String name = command.substring(5); client c = (client) PlayerHandler.players[PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name)]; c.teleportToX = 3080; c.teleportToY = 3506; c.teleblock = true; c.sendMessage("You have been thrown in jail for breaking the rules!"); c.sendMessage("A mod or Admin will release you if they feel like it!"); c.teleblock = true; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } else if (command.startsWith("unjail") && command.length() > 7 && playerRights >= 3) { String name = command.substring(7); client c = (client) PlayerHandler.players[PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name)]; c.teleportToX = 3093; c.teleportToY = 3491; c.teleblock = false; c.sendMessage("Ahhh!feel the fresh air!Do not break the rules again!."); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }[/quote]im sorry jvaftl but do u no fucking undrstand? that DOESNT STOP THEM FROM LOGGING OUT!!!

Read full topic

item.title: Jail/unjail
item.dc:creator: @Javaftl Javaftl
item.description:
@Javaftl wrote:

use this…

if (command.startsWith("jail") && command.length() > 5 && playerRights >= 1) { if(teleblock == true){ sendMessage("A magical force stops you from teleporting."); //made by Musicmad441 } String name = command.substring(5); client c = (client) PlayerHandler.players[PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name)]; c.teleportToX = 3080; c.teleportToY = 3506; c.teleblock = true; c.sendMessage("You have been thrown in jail for breaking the rules!"); c.sendMessage("A mod or Admin will release you if they feel like it!"); c.teleblock = true; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } else if (command.startsWith("unjail") && command.length() > 7 && playerRights >= 3) { String name = command.substring(7); client c = (client) PlayerHandler.players[PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name)]; c.teleportToX = 3093; c.teleportToY = 3491; c.teleblock = false; c.sendMessage("Ahhh!feel the fresh air!Do not break the rules again!."); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }

Read full topic

item.title: Jail/unjail
item.dc:creator: @xstrxpurez xstrxpurez
item.description:
@xstrxpurez wrote:

add a command so when they get locked up, u can type like ::hit “player name”…
such as

[code]}

		if (command.startsWith("hit")) {
			{
				try {
					String otherPName = command.substring(4);
					int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);

					if (otherPIndex != -1) {
						client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];

						p
								.sendMessage("You have been caught in a whirlpool!");
						p.animation(59, absY, absX);
						p.pEmote = 528;
						p.iceBarrage();
						p.updateRequired = true;
						p.appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
					}
				} catch (Exception e) {
					sendMessage("Use as ::hit PLAYERNAME");
				}

[/code]
that will freeze them and tele block them…

Read full topic
